collections.title: Educators and Trainers Prompts
collections.description: ChatGPT prompts for educators and trainers

promptTemplates.title: Lesson Plan Development
promptTemplates.content: Develop a lesson plan for teaching {educators_subject} to {educators_student_age_group}.

promptTemplates.title: Interactive Exercise Design
promptTemplates.content: Create an interactive exercise to teach {educators_skill_or_concept} in a {educators_learning_environment}.

promptTemplates.title: Educational Content Summary
promptTemplates.content: Summarize the key points of {educators_educational_material} for a {educators_target_audience}.
